item.title: Medicaid Is Junk Health Care
item.description: Will Republicans have the courage to expose that and improve it?

item.title: ‘Daylight’ with Israel, Trump Style
item.description: Israelis can be forgiven for wondering whether the Netanyahu government has overinvested in its relationship with the Trump administration.

item.title: A New Pope Leo for a New Industrial Revolution
item.description: Leo XIII read Frederic Bastiat and was impressed by what good economics could teach us. The new Pope Leo XIV should embrace his example.

item.title: Passing the Big, Beautiful Bill
item.description: Republicans need to be willing to say ‘no’ to the moderates in the caucus.

item.title: Rich D.C. Colleges Don’t Deserve Taxpayer Giveaways
item.description: Taxpayers in Washington should not be subsidizing wealthy institutions while funding for essential city services is slashed to the bone.
